document.full_text: friends and neighbors in the close-knit town of darden searched on friday for holly bobo, a 20-year-old nursing student last seen being dragged across the carport of the family's home toward a wooded area wednesday morning, officials said.
document.title: search continues for missing 20-year-old tennessee woman
lines_and_colors: friends and neighbors in the close-knit town of darden searched on friday for holly bobo, a 20-year-old nursing student last seen being dragged across the carport of the family's home toward a wooded area wednesday morning, officials said.
